desc: Research project to develop a smartwatch-based voice assistant for the digitalization of construction processes.
task: connection of IoT sensors via local network server to central application server
implementation of local network servers to manage various LoRaWAN end nodes and gateways using ChirpStack
integration of information transfer from the local network server to the application server via HTTP, MQTT, OPC UA with bcUA RTS, OpenDDS and RTI DDS
configuration and administration of the central application server
automation of the server and network configurations using Ansible
continuous coordination with other project partners
